posts.post_content:
You guys underestimate lifegain.  
Yeah, straight lifegain is almost invariable terrible, but hybrid lifegain like this little number is actually pretty decent. Turn what would have been a chump into a successful block, and gain a healthy sum of life out of the deal. It will annoy aggro decks pretty thoroughly.
